example.code:
PS C:\>Get-IAMMFADevice -UserName David
EnableDate SerialNumber UserName ---------- ------------ -------- 4/8/2015 9:41:10 AM arn:aws:iam::123456789012:mfa/David David
example.description: This example returns details about the MFA device assigned to the IAM user David. In this example you can tell that it is a virtual device because the SerialNumber is an ARN instead of a physical device's actual serial number.
